name: Preplaced
description: Our mentors are top industry experts associated with global brands and companies across tiers. They are selected after a thorough screening process to ensure that you always get the best-qualified mentors to guide you.
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Reduce the Cost of Hiring Qualified Employees
Headline: Personalized Learning Led by Mentors
ShortDescription: At Preplaced, we are dedicated to helping people achieve their career goals by providing mentor-led guidance.

Highlights.name: Unlimited Chat with Mentor
Highlights.description: Doubt? Get the right advice from your mentor via Chat.Doubt? Get the right advice from your mentor via Chat.

Highlights.name: Task & Curated Resources
Highlights.description: Yes! You will be certified for this mentorship program.

Highlights.name: Job Referrals
Highlights.description: Get Referrals from mentor community to top product and service based companies.

enhanced_description: Preplaced provides personalized, one-to-one mentorship programs designed to help individuals achieve their career goals. Mentors are top industry experts associated with global brands and companies across tiers, selected through a thorough screening process. The service offers guidance across various career fields, specializing in interview preparation. Key features include unlimited chat communication with mentors, access to curated resources and assignable tasks, and opportunities for job referrals from the mentor community to top product and service-based companies. Successful completion of mentorship programs can also lead to certification.
competitive_advantages: Mentors are top industry experts from global brands
Access to job referrals from mentor community
roi_benefits: Increased hiring manager confidence and productivity (through better-prepared candidates)
Faster and more efficient hiring of top talent (through access to a mentored talent pool and referrals)
Reduced cost of hiring qualified employees (through better-prepared candidates and referrals)
Enhanced candidate quality and readiness for employment
primary_users: Individuals seeking career guidance and development
HR professionals/recruiters (potentially leveraging mentored talent or offering mentorship as an employee benefit)
